title: Ligareaux
author: Ligareaux
created_time: August 12, 2023, 03:39:37 PMLast edit: March 03, 2024, 12:38:20 PM by Ligareaux
content: Greetings,I trust you are enjoying a splendid weekend.I come here offering two things: My own Spanish translation services, and our team's bulk translations offer.Spanish Translations:Are you seeking to broaden your digital horizon by reaching out to the vast Spanish-speaking audience? Spanish, being the fourth most widely spoken language globally, offers limitless opportunities for your website's growth.Leverage my extensive expertise in the translation sector to gain a competitive edge in Google's Search Engine rankings. I specialize in identifying and implementing the most effective Spanish keywords, ensuring your website stands out amidst the competition.I guarantee flawless Spanish translations, characterized by impeccable grammar and engaging readability. Furthermore, I offer a swift turnaround time, delivering your translated articles within a day.My name is Fuba, a seasoned Spanish translator with a robust portfolio of over 150 long articles translated (+3000 words/article) and over 400 shorter ones (+500 words/article)This is my current translation portfolio:1. https://winz.io/es (I translated the whole website, including terms and conditions, and ongoing promotions). 2. https://coingambling.info/es/ (Mostly everything is translated by me, except for some older sections or articles.)3. https://tradingbot.info/es/ All of these sites amount to over 150 articles translated. The second website has updated itself every year, so among those 150 articles, some are long gone by now.Copywriting portfolio: *Some of the mini-reviews in coingambling have been written by me in Spanish, as well.I haven't found exactly where all of the articles I've written are, as I am not the one who publishes them, but I managed to find two:https://www.iprofesional.com/tecnologia/376148-los-mejores-criptocasinos-en-2023https://www.granvalparaiso.cl/sociedad/los-mejores-bonos-de-bienvenida-en-casinos-bitcoin-que-no-te-podras-perder-en-2023/These aren't exactly new, and I've become better at it after the passage of time.For any queries or further discussion, please reach out to me via Telegram @Fuba311, email me at duckerzgamer@gmail.com or simply send a DM here.I accept payments in any kind of crypto and paypal. (price depends on the length of the project, but it's usually affordable. It includes proofreading as well).Allow me to assist you in elevating your website's ranking, driving increased traffic, and maximizing the potential of your Spanish translations.If you've made it this far, then I shall grant you a gift: The first translation is free (up to 1500 words).Bulk Translation Services:We specialize in Spanish, Italian, and Portuguese, ensuring speed and quality with every project. If you're familiar with my work, you'll know that quality is a cornerstone of what I do (you can review my Spanish portfolio through the link above).Here's the deal: for projects exceeding 100,000 words, our rates drop significantly to just 2.5 cents per word. This competitive pricing doesn't compromise the quality or the turnaround time of our translations.While Spanish, Italian, and Portuguese are our main languages, our vast network allows us to offer translations in additional languages upon request. So, if you have specific language needs, feel free to ask!For your convenience, main contacts are available on Telegram:@Fuba311@Michel1216 (italian translations)Alternatively, you can reach out to me via Bitcointalk. Please note, I might not check the forum regularly, so for a quicker response, Telegram would be the way to go.Looking forward to assisting you with your translation needs and helping your projects reach a wider audience.

comments.author: bitcoincasino.info
comments.body: We have been working with Fuba for 2.5 years and I can recommend his service! <3He is not just blindly translating text, but also proofreading it with checking for any incorrect or outdated information.

comments.author: Ligareaux
comments.body: Updated with new bulk translation services!
